scripts.installAll: npm run build --prefix ./signature-wrapper && npm run build --prefix ./authorisation-wrapper && npm run build --prefix ./track-and-trace-wrapper

scripts.testAll: npm run test --prefix ./signature-wrapper && npm run test --prefix ./authorisation-wrapper && npm run test --prefix ./track-and-trace-wrapper
